mod.name: Glutton Mod
mod.description: Adds a new character: The Glutton.

cards.name: Hunger Pang
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When drawn, lose 2 HP and draw another card.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Flail
cards.description: Lose 3 HP. Deal 10 damage.

cards.name: Flail+
cards.description: Lose 3 HP. Deal 15 damage.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Bite

Deal 7 damage.
Heal 2 HP.

cards.name: Bite+

Deal 8 damage.
Heal 3 HP.

cards.name: Borborygmi
cards.description: Deal 4 damage and apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Borborygmi+

cards.name: Brace
cards.description:
Lose 5 HP.
Gain 20 Block.

cards.name: Brace+

Lose 5 HP.
Gain 25 Block.

cards.name: Demolish
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.
If this card is Exhausted, deal 4 damage to ALL enemies three times.

cards.name: Demolish+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.
If this card is Exhausted, deal 6 damage to ALL enemies three times.

cards.name: Devour
cards.description:
Exhaust a card.
Deal 10 damage.

cards.name: Devour+
cards.description:
Exhaust a card.
Deal 15 damage.

cards.name: Feed
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
If this kills a
non-minion enemy,
raise your Max HP by 3. Exhaust.

cards.name: Feed+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
If this kills a
non-minion enemy,
raise your Max HP by 4. Exhaust.

cards.name: Gnawing Hunger
cards.description: Lose 7 HP. Deal 6 damage. When played, permanently increase the damage by 2. Exhaust.

cards.name: Gnawing Hunger+
cards.description: Lose 7 HP. Deal 6 damage. When played, permanently increase the damage by 2.

cards.name: Guard Stance
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Heal 8 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Guard Stance+
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Heal 12 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Knee-Jerk
cards.description: Deal 10 damage. If you have lost at least 3 HP this turn, Gain [R] [R] .

cards.name: Knee-Jerk+
cards.description: Deal 14 damage. If you have lost at least 3 HP this turn, Gain [R] [R] .

cards.name: Lash Out
cards.description:
Exhaust a random card.
Deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Lash Out+
cards.description:
Exhaust a card.
Deal 11 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Pain Meditation
cards.description: Draw a card. If you have lost at least 3 HP this turn, draw another card.

cards.name: Pain Meditation+
cards.description: Draw a card. If you have lost at least 3 HP this turn, draw another card.

cards.name: Rest
cards.description:
Gain 2 Vulnerable.

Exhaust.

cards.name: Rest+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Vulnerable.
Heal 10 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Salivate
cards.description: Apply 2 Weak. If you have lost at least 3 HP this turn, also apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Salivate+
cards.description: Apply 3 Weak. If you have lost at least 3 HP this turn, also apply 3 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Scab
cards.description:
Heal 5 HP.
Shuffle a Hunger_Pang into your discard pile.

cards.name: Scab+
cards.description:
Heal 8 HP.
Shuffle a Hunger_Pang into your discard pile.

cards.name: Self Flagellate
cards.description: Lose 3 HP. Exhaust a card. Gain 2 Strength.

cards.name: Self Flagellate+
cards.description: Lose 3 HP. Exhaust a card. Gain 3 Strength.

cards.name: Slam
cards.description: Lose 2 HP. Deal 8 damage.

cards.name: Slam+
cards.description: Lose 2 HP. Deal 12 damage.

cards.name: Tantrum
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage to a random enemy.
If this card is Exhausted, deal 16 damage to the enemy with the least HP.

cards.name: Tantrum+
cards.description:
Deal 21 damage to a random enemy.
If this card is Exhausted, deal 21 damage to the enemy with the least HP.

cards.name: Thrombosis
cards.description:
Lose 3 HP.
Heal 3 HP a turn for the next 3 turns.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Thrombosis+
cards.description:
Lose 3 HP.
Heal 3 HP a turn for the next 4 turns.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Treat
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
If this card is Exhausted, gain 2 Maximum HP.

cards.name: Treat+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
If this card is Exhausted, gain 4 Maximum HP.

cards.name: Yearn
cards.description:
Draw a card. If it is not a Status or Curse, create an Echo of it that costs 1 less.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Yearn+
cards.description: Draw a card. If it is not a Status or Curse, create an Echo of it that costs 1 less.

cards.name: Autotomy
cards.description:
Retain.
Exhaust all Status and Curse cards in your hand and gain 10 Block for each.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Autotomy+
cards.description:
Retain.
Exhaust all Status and Curse cards in your hand and gain 13 Block for each.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Belly Slam
cards.description: Deal damage equal to your HP divided by 4.

cards.name: Belly Slam+
cards.description: Deal damage equal to your HP divided by 3.

cards.name: Bloody Knuckle
cards.description: Give an enemy 1 Thorns. Deal 6 damage 3 times.

cards.name: Bloody Knuckle+
cards.description: Give an enemy 1 Thorns. Deal 8 damage 3 times.

cards.name: Chomp
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage.
Heal for unblocked damage dealt. Exhaust.

cards.name: Chomp+

Deal 21 damage.
Heal for unblocked damage dealt. Exhaust.

Heal 20 HP.

cards.name: Chrysosphagy+

Heal 30 HP.

cards.name: Clot
cards.description:
Lose 1 HP.
Gain 1 Maximum HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Clot+
cards.description:
Lose 1 HP.
Gain 1 Maximum HP.
Draw a card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Decrepit Strike
cards.description: Deal 10 damage. If you are Weak, Deal 10 damage two additional times.

cards.name: Decrepit Strike+
cards.description: Deal 13 damage. If you are Weak, Deal 13 damage two additional times.

cards.name: Delusion
cards.description:
Create an Echo of a non-Ethereal card in your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Delusion+
cards.description:
Create two Echoes of a non-Ethereal card in your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.description:
Unplayable.
When drawn, lose 1 HP and gain [R].

cards.description: Lose 2 HP and deal 10 damage X times.

cards.name: Distilled Agony+
cards.description: Lose 2 HP and deal 13 damage X times.

cards.name: Feast
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
For every non-minion enemy killed, raise your Max HP by 3. Exhaust.

cards.name: Feast+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage to ALL enemies.
For every non-minion enemy killed, raise your Max HP by 4. Exhaust.

cards.name: Feeble Kick
cards.description: Deal 7 damage. If you have a Debuff, Gain [R] and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Feeble Kick+
cards.description: Deal 10 damage. If you have a Debuff, Gain [R] and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Fever
cards.description:
Heal 6 HP.
Gain 3 Poison.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fever Visions
cards.description: At the start of your turn, if you have a Debuff, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Fever Visions+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, if you have a Debuff, draw 2 cards.

Unplayable.

cards.name: Revivivfication+

cards.description:
If you are Weak, apply 2 Weak to ALL enemies.
Repeat for Frail and Vulnerable.

cards.name: Share Weakness+
cards.description:
If you are Weak, apply 3 Weak to ALL enemies.
Repeat for Frail and Vulnerable.

cards.name: Shed Fat
cards.description:
Exhaust your hand. Draw that many cards plus 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Shed Fat+

Retain. Exhaust your hand. Draw that many cards plus 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Strain
cards.description: Deal 12 damage. Gain 1 Weak.

cards.name: Strain+
cards.description: Deal 17 damage. Gain 1 Weak.

cards.name: Throb
cards.description: Deal 7 damage. If you have lost at least 3 HP this turn, Gain 7 Block.

cards.name: Throb+
cards.description: Deal 10 damage. If you have lost at least 3 HP this turn, Gain 10 Block.

cards.name: Torment
cards.description:
Can only be played if you have lost life 15 or more times this combat.
Deal 30 damage.

cards.name: Torment+
cards.description:
Can only be played if you have lost life 10 or more times this combat.
Deal 30 damage.

cards.name: Toxic Residue
cards.description: Whenever a card is Exhausted, apply 3 Poison to a random enemy.

cards.name: Toxic Residue+

cards.description:
Gain 2 Weak, Frail, and Vulnerable.

Gain 2 Weak, Frail, and Vulnerable.
Apply 11 Poison.

cards.description:

cards.name: Tumor+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Weak, Frail, and Vulnerable.
If this card is Exhausted, draw 3 cards.

cards.description: Deal 12 damage. Shuffle a Hunger_Pang into your discard pile.

cards.name: Voracity+
cards.description: Deal 17 damage. Shuffle a Hunger_Pang into your discard pile.

cards.name: Avarice
cards.description:
Costs 1 less [R]  for every 100 Gold you have.
Deal 30 damage.

cards.name: Avarice+
cards.description:
Costs 1 less [R]  for every 100 Gold you have.
Deal 40 damage.

cards.name: Eat Alive
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Gain Maximum HP for unblocked damage dealt. Exhaust.

cards.name: Eat Alive+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Gain Maximum HP for unblocked damage dealt. Exhaust.

cards.name: Enfeeblement
cards.description: Whenever you gain a Debuff, deal 4 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Enfeeblement+
cards.description: Whenever you gain a Debuff, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Excrescence
cards.description: Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your deck. Shuffle 2 Hunger_Pangs into your discard pile.

cards.name: Excrescence+
cards.description: Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your deck. Shuffle 2 Hunger_Pangs into your discard pile.

cards.name: Fast
cards.description: Draw 3 Cards. Shuffle two Hunger_Pangs into your discard pile.

cards.name: Fast+
cards.description: Draw 5 Cards. Shuffle two Hunger_Pangs into your discard pile.

cards.name: Fragile Might
cards.description: Deal 5 damage. Double the number of hits for each Debuff you have.

cards.name: Fragile Might+
cards.description: Deal 7 damage. Double the number of hits for each Debuff you have.

cards.name: Hemophilia
cards.description: Gain 1 Bleed. Apply 3 Bleed to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Hemophilia+
cards.description: Gain 1 Bleed. Apply 4 Bleed to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Inversion
cards.description:
If you are Weak, gain 2 Strength.
If you are Frail, gain 2 Dexterity.
If you are Vulnerable, gain 15 Block.

cards.name: Inversion+
cards.description:
If you are Weak, gain 3 Strength.
If you are Frail, gain 3 Dexterity.
If you are Vulnerable, gain 20 Block.

cards.name: Malignancy
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If this card is Exhausted, gain 2 Intangible.

cards.name: Malignancy+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Retain.
If this card is Exhausted, gain 2 Intangible.

cards.name: Megrim
cards.description: Whenever you draw a card, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Megrim+
cards.description: Whenever you draw a card, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Nostalgia
cards.description: Whenever you Exhaust a non-Ethereal Skill or Attack, create an Echo of it.

cards.name: Nostalgia+
cards.description: Whenever you Exhaust a non-Ethereal Skill or Attack, create an Echo of it.

cards.name: Reminisce
cards.description: Deal 4 damage for each card in your Exhaust pile.

cards.name: Reminisce+
cards.description: Deal 5 damage for each card in your Exhaust pile.

cards.name: Retaliation
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to twice the number of times you have lost HP this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Retaliation+
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to thrice the number of times you have lost HP this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Starvation Mode
cards.description:
Gain Starving.
Whenever you draw a Status or Curse, apply 4 Poison to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Starvation Mode+
cards.description:
Gain Starving.
Whenever you draw a Status or Curse, apply 6 Poison to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Treasure
cards.description: If you have less than 300 gold, gain 35 Gold. Otherwise, add 3 random rare cards to your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Treasure+
cards.description: If you have less than 300 gold, gain 50 Gold. Otherwise, add 3 random rare cards to your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Vitality
cards.description: Whenever you heal HP, gain [R].

cards.name: Vitality+
cards.description:
Innate.
Whenever you heal HP, gain [R].

relics.name: Eternal Hunger
relics.description: At the start of your turn, lose 1 HP and draw 1 card.

relics.name: Amulet of Pain
relics.description: Every 5 times you take damage in combat, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: A cursed trinket designed to draw the evil eye.

relics.name: Half-Eaten Sandwich
relics.description: At the end of combat, heal 2 HP and raise your Max HP by 1.
relics.flavorText: Somebody didn't have time to finish their lunch.

relics.name: Lucky Sock
relics.description: Gold gain during combat is increased by 25%.
relics.flavorText: Its owner never, ever, ever took it off.

relics.name: Muscle Shirt
relics.description: Every third time you gain a Debuff, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Work through the sweat. Work past the tears.

relics.name: Syringe
relics.description: Whenever you heal HP, deal 6 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: What's in it? Just some water and food coloring.

relics.name: Treadmill
relics.description: Whenever you Exhaust a non-Ethereal card, heal 3 HP.
relics.flavorText: A torturous device designed to stave off the effects of gluttony.

relics.name: Doggy Bag
relics.description: Whenever you defeat an elite, raise your Max HP by 10.
relics.flavorText: The carefully packed remains of a tasty meal.

relics.name: Gemstone
relics.description: At the start of each combat, if you have 300 or more Gold, gain 2 Strength and 2 Dexterity.

relics.name: Infinite Famine
relics.description: Replaces Eternal Hunger. At the start of your turn, lose 2 HP and draw 2 cards.

relics.name: Lollipop
relics.description: Reduce the HP loss of Eternal Hunger, Infinite Famine, and Hunger Pangs by 1.
relics.flavorText: A satisfying solution to an oral fixation.

keywords.name: Bleed
keywords.description: Bleeding creatures lose HP at the start of their turn.

keywords.name: Hunger pang
keywords.description: Hunger Pangs are unplayable Status cards that damage you and draw you new cards.

keywords.name: Starving
keywords.description: At the start of each turn, add Hunger Pangs to your discard pile.
